response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align perfectly with your needs. Given its high value and importance, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire such a valuable asset at a discounted rate. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 9500}
